name: Bewitched (PyramidCake)
description:
Would you like to help the little witch Lyria to end the Void's corruption and save the rest of the world with her peculiar slime power?

Bewitched is an adventure game where the player will have to reach the soul ashes by avoiding platforms and facing enemies using their spells.

When you reach the ashes, you will have to go back to the start in a time trial, as the void will be chasing you. All the actions that she has performed on the departure  will be of great use to him on the way back, adapting to his style of play, thus providing a diversity of possible situations.

Studio: Pyramid Cake

Brais Alvarez: Technical artist & Gameplay programmer

Marta Egido: Concept artist & Animator

Félix Fernández: Game designer & Producer

Ricard Martín: UI/UX designer & AI programmer 

Ian Molins: 3d artist & Rigger

Controller is recomended for a better experience
